title: How much is enough
creator_credit: Bill Latto and Town and Country Productions
brief_description: Deals with the work of the United Nations Children’s Fund in Africa, the Near East, Pakistan, the Orient and the West Indies. It shows the scope and the type of work done by the organisation which raises money all over the world to help needy children in underdeveloped areas
